Title: Classifies military monuments and memorials as parkland
Summary: Classifies military monuments and memorials as parkland; provides that no such monument or memorial shall be alienated, developed, leased, transferred, sold or discontinued for use as a memorial site without the approval of the legislature.
LawCode: Amd ยง99-w, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to classifying military monuments and memorials as parkland
